projects.title: Weather Dashboard CI/CD
projects.description: GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline. Dockerized application deployed on Netlify with Prometheus/Grafana monitoring. Architecture diagram included for scalability insights.

projects.title: MERN Inventory System w/ DevOps
projects.description: CI/CD: Docker + GitHub Actions. Deployed to AWS EC2 with auto-backups and monitoring. Full-stack application with MongoDB backend and React frontend. Architecture diagram included.
